name: CUBE (itch) (Petrzel)
description: CUBE IS A GIANT STRUCTURE CONSISTING OF MANY IDENTICAL ROOMS. SOME MIGHT SAY IT IS SOME SORT OF LABYRINTH, OTHERS MIGHT CLAIM IT IS A PRISON. BOTH OPINIONS ARE EQUALLY VALID. YOU ARE PLACED SOMEWHERE INTO THE CUBE. THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY OUT - THE ESCAPE ROOM. IF YOU FIND IT, YOU ARE FREE. SOUNDS EASY, RIGHT? WELL, NO. THIS GAME IS BASED UPON THE FAMOUS SCI-FI MOVIE CUBE (1997) WHICH WAS DIRECTED BY VINCENZO NATALI. I THOUGHT THE MOVIE DESERVED AN ADAPTION TO THE VIDEOGAME WORLD AND SO I MADE ONE. I AM AWARE THERE IS ALREADY A GAME (HALFDEAD, HALFDEAD 2) THAT USES A SIMILAR THEME, BUT IT IS NOT ANYTHING LIKE THE ORIGINAL MOVIE. I HAVE TRIED TO CAPTURE THE ATMOSPHERE AND MOST IMPORTANTLY, THE LOGIC BEHIND THE CUBE.  MAIN WEBSITE OF THE PROJECT CAN BE FOUND HERE. CUBE IS THE DEADLIEST SHAPE RUN! YOU MIGHT ESCAPE!
